title: Vengeful Giorgio
description: She's the enemy's daughter... And I'll do anything to have my revenge on her father.I am Giorgio Bonifacio - once the mafia prince of of the Bonifacios, and now, the Cavetti's captive. They're intent on torturing me, making my life a living hell. Natalia is my light in the darkness - the rebellious mafia princess who tells me stories while I recover from my wounds.But Natalia's too naive for her own good. The moment I get my hands on her, my plan for revenge will begin. I'll kill her if I have to. Anything to get back at her family.Except Natalia is more than a pawn. She cares for me, and she's so beautiful I can't resist my desire for her. As lust mixes with vengefulness, my desire to avenge my own family, the Bonifacios, grows. And if revenge means killing the woman I'm starting to crave, so be it...Vengeful Giorgio is the third book of a mafia romance series following two families - the Cavettis and Bonifacios. This is a dark romance with disturbing themes.
author: Raven  Scott
